name: Build and Deploy to GitHub Pages with Local Backend

instructions.step1: Your IP address is already configured: 192.168.0.53
instructions.step2: Or use ngrok for secure tunneling and replace YOUR_NGROK_URL
instructions.step3: Run 'npm run build:github-pages' or 'npm run build:github-pages:ngrok'
instructions.step4: The built files will be in 'dist/' folder ready for GitHub Pages
